pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for Delphi's 'COVIDcast Epidata' API // Tools for Delphi's 'COVIDcast Epidata' API: data access, maps and time series plotting, and basic signal processing. The API includes a collection of numerous indicators relevant to the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States, including official reports, de- identified aggregated medical claims data, large-scale surveys of symptoms and public behavior, and mobility data, typically updated daily and at the county level. All data sources are documented at https://cmu-delphi.github.io/delphi- epidata/api/covidcast.html.
